(2.14)
The product BAis not deﬁned ifm̸= nsince the neighboring dimensions
do not match. ♦
Remark. Matrix multiplication isnot deﬁned as an element-wise operation
on matrix elements, i.e., cij ̸= aijbij (even if the size of A,B was cho-
sen appropriately). This kind of element-wise multiplication often appears
in programming languages when we multiply (multi-dimensional) arrays
with each other, and is called a Hadamard product. ♦ Hadamard product
